name: Dulce de Leche Energy Balls
description: Quick, no-bake, nutritious bites! Prepare these tasty protein balls on Sunday for a quick, on-the-go breakfast thatâ€™s ready for the whole week!

ingredients.name: Dulce de Leche Instant Pudding Mix or Chocolate Instant Pudding Mix
Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend or Power Up Salted Caramel Protein Blend

preparation:
1. In a large bowl, combine pudding mix, rolled oats, chia seeds, and protein blend, if using. Stir in nut butter, maple syrup, and coconut oil until evenly combined.
  2. Using 2 tbsp as a guide, roll into balls.
  3. Store in refrigerator up to one week in a sealed container. Top with coconut before serving, if desired.
tips: Use your Prep Pro Scoop (2 Tbsp) to help you scoop balls.
